list.title: Rand
list.description: Rand returns a random byte slice of length n

list.title: RandInt
list.description: RandInt returns a random int

list.title: ToBytes
list.description: ToBytes converts given input to byte slice

list.title: ToString
list.description: ToString converts given input to string

list.title: getNetworkPort
list.description: getNetworkPort registers defaultPort and returns defaultPort if it is a colliding port with other protocols

list.title: isPortOpen
list.description: isPortOpen checks if given port is open on host. timeout is optional and defaults to 5 seconds

list.title: log
list.description: log prints given input to stdout with [JS] prefix for debugging purposes

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#Bytes
list.description: Bytes returns the byte slice of the buffer.

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#Hex
list.description: Hex returns the hex representation of the buffer.

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#Hexdump
list.description: Hexdump returns the hexdump representation of the buffer.

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#Len
list.description: Len returns the length of the buffer.

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#Pack
list.description: Pack uses structs.Pack and packs given data and appends it to the buffer. It packs the data according to the given format.

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#String
list.description: String returns the string representation of the buffer.

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#Write
list.description: Write appends a byte slice to the buffer.

list.title: module:bytes~Buffer#WriteString
list.description: WriteString appends a string to the buffer.

list.title: module:bytes~NewBuffer
list.description: NewBuffer creates a new buffer from a byte slice.

list.title: module:fs~ListDir
list.description: ListDir lists all files and directories within a path depending on the itemType provided. itemType can be any one of ['file','dir','all']

list.title: module:fs~ReadFile
list.description: ReadFile reads file contents within permitted paths

list.title: module:fs~ReadFileAsString
list.description: ReadFileAsString reads file contents within permitted paths and returns content as string

list.title: module:fs~ReadFilesFromDir
list.description: ReadFilesFromDir reads all files from a directory and returns a array with file contents of all files

list.title: module:goconsole~GoConsolePrinter#Error
list.description: Error logs an error message

list.title: module:goconsole~GoConsolePrinter#Log
list.description: Log logs a message

list.title: module:goconsole~GoConsolePrinter#Warn
list.description: Warn logs a warning message

list.title: module:goconsole~NewGoConsolePrinter
list.description: NewGoConsolePrinter creates a new instance of GoConsolePrinter

list.title: module:ikev2~IKEMessage#AppendPayload
list.description: AppendPayload appends a payload to the IKE message

list.title: module:ikev2~IKEMessage#Encode
list.description: Encode encodes the final IKE message

list.title: module:kerberos~EnumerateUserResponse
list.description: EnumerateUserResponse is the response object from the EnumerateUser method.

list.title: module:kerberos~KerberosClient#EnumerateUser
list.description: EnumerateUser returns true if the user exists in the domain. If the user is not found, false is returned. If the user is found, true is returned. Optionally, the AS-REP hash is also returned if discovered.

list.title: module:ldap~LDAPMetadata
list.description: LDAPMetadata is an object containing metadata from ldap server.

list.title: module:ldap~LdapClient#CollectLdapMetadata
list.description: CollectLdapMetadata collects metadata from ldap server.

list.title: module:ldap~LdapClient#IsLdap
list.description: IsLdap checks if the given host and port are running ldap server.

list.title: module:mssql~MSSQLClient#Connect
list.description: Connect connects to MS SQL database using given credentials. If connection is successful, it returns true. If connection is unsuccessful, it returns false and error. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mssql~MSSQLClient#ConnectWithDB
list.description: ConnectWithDB connects to MS SQL database using given credentials and database name. If connection is successful, it returns true. If connection is unsuccessful, it returns false and error. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mssql~MSSQLClient#IsMssql
list.description: IsMssql checks if the given host is running MS SQL database. If the host is running MS SQL database, it returns true. If the host is not running MS SQL database, it returns false.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#Connect
list.description: Connect connects to MySQL database using given credentials. If connection is successful, it returns true. If connection is unsuccessful, it returns false and error. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#ConnectWithDB
list.description: ConnectWithDB connects to MySQL database using given credentials and database name. If connection is successful, it returns true. If connection is unsuccessful, it returns false and error. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#ExecuteQuery
list.description: ExecuteQuery connects to Mysql database using given credentials and database name and executes a query on the db.

list.title: module:mysql~MySQLClient#IsMySQL
list.description: IsMySQL checks if the given host is running MySQL database. If the host is running MySQL database, it returns true. If the host is not running MySQL database, it returns false.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#Close
list.description: Close closes the connection.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#Recv
list.description: Recv receives data from the connection with a timeout. If N is 0, it will read up to 4096 bytes.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#RecvHex
list.description: RecvHex receives data from the connection with a timeout in hex format. If N is 0, it will read up to 4096 bytes.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#RecvString
list.description: RecvString receives data from the connection with a timeout. Output is returned as a string. If N is 0, it will read up to 4096 bytes.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#Send
list.description: Send sends data to the connection with a timeout.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#SendArray
list.description: SendArray sends array data to connection.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#SendHex
list.description: SendHex sends hex data to connection.

list.title: module:net~NetConn#SetTimeout
list.description: SetTimeout sets read/write timeout for the connection (in seconds).

list.title: module:net~Open
list.description: Open opens a new connection to the address with a timeout. Supported protocols: tcp, udp.

list.title: module:net~OpenTLS
list.description: OpenTLS opens a new connection to the address with a timeout. Supported protocols: tcp, udp.

list.title: module:oracle~IsOracleResponse
list.description: IsOracleResponse is an object containing the response from the Oracle server.

list.title: module:oracle~OracleClient#IsOracle
list.description: IsOracle checks if a host is running an Oracle server.

list.title: module:pop3~IsPOP3Response
list.description: IsPOP3Response is an object containing the response of the IsPOP3 check.

list.title: module:pop3~Pop3Client#IsPOP3
list.description: IsPOP3 checks if a host is running a POP3 server

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#Connect
list.description: Connect connects to Postgres database using given credentials. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#ConnectWithDB
list.description: ConnectWithDB connects to Postgres database using given credentials and database name. The connection is closed after the function returns.

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#ExecuteQuery
list.description: ExecuteQuery connects to Postgres database using given credentials and database name and executes a query on the db.

list.title: module:postgres~PGClient#IsPostgres
list.description: IsPostgres checks if the given host and port are running Postgres database.

list.title: module:rdp~CheckRDPAuthResponse
list.description: CheckRDPAuthResponse is the response from the CheckRDPAuth method.

list.title: module:rdp~IsRDPResponse
list.description: IsRDPResponse is the response from the IsRDP method.

list.title: module:rdp~RDPClient#CheckRDPAuth
list.description: CheckRDPAuth checks if the given host and port are running rdp server with authentication and returns their metadata.

list.title: module:rdp~RDPClient#IsRDP
list.description: IsRDP checks if the given host and port are running rdp server. If connection is successful, it returns true. If connection is unsuccessful, it returns false and error. The Name of the OS is also returned if the connection is successful.

list.title: module:redis~Connect
list.description: Connect tries to connect redis server with password

list.title: module:redis~GetServerInfo
list.description: GetServerInfo returns the server info for a redis server

list.title: module:redis~GetServerInfoAuth
list.description: GetServerInfoAuth returns the server info for a redis server

list.title: module:redis~IsAuthenticated
list.description: IsAuthenticated checks if the redis server requires authentication

list.title: module:redis~RunLuaScript
list.description: RunLuaScript runs a lua script on the redis server

list.title: module:rsync~IsRsyncResponse
list.description: IsRsyncResponse is an object containing the response from the IsRsync check.

list.title: module:rsync~RsyncClient#IsRsync
list.description: IsRsync checks if a host is running a Rsync server.

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#ConnectSMBInfoMode
list.description: ConnectSMBInfoMode tries to connect to provided host and port and discover SMB information

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#DetectSMBGhost
list.description: DetectSMBGhost tries to detect SMBGhost vulnerability by using SMBv3 compression feature.

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#ListSMBv2Metadata
list.description: ListSMBv2Metadata tries to connect to provided host and port and list SMBv2 metadata.

list.title: module:smb~SMBClient#ListShares
list.description: ListShares tries to connect to provided host and port and list shares by using given credentials.

list.title: module:smb~SMBLog
list.description: SMBLog is an object containing the log of the SMB handshake.

list.title: module:smb~ServiceSMB
list.description: ServiceSMB is an object containing the metadata of the SMBv2 service.

list.title: module:smtp~IsSMTPResponse
list.description: IsSMTPResponse is an object containing the response of the IsSMTP check.

list.title: module:smtp~SMTPClient#IsSMTP
list.description: IsSMTP checks if a host is running a SMTP server.

list.title: module:ssh~HandshakeLog
list.description: HandshakeLog is a object containing information about the ssh connection.

list.title: module:ssh~SSHClient#Connect
list.description: Connect tries to connect to provided host and port with provided username and password with ssh. Returns state of connection and error. If error is not nil, state will be false.

list.title: module:ssh~SSHClient#ConnectSSHInfoMode
list.description: ConnectSSHInfoMode tries to connect to provided host and port. Returns HandshakeLog and error. If error is not nil, state will be false. HandshakeLog is a struct that contains information about the ssh connection.

list.title: module:ssh~SSHClient#ConnectWithKey
list.description: ConnectWithKey tries to connect to provided host and port with provided username and private_key. Returns state of connection and error. If error is not nil, state will be false.

list.title: module:structs~Pack
list.description:
Pack returns a byte slice containing the values of msg slice packed according to the given format.
The items of msg slice must match the values required by the format exactly.

list.title: module:structs~StructsCalcSize
list.description: StructsCalcSize returns the number of bytes needed to pack the values according to the given format.

list.title: module:structs~Unpack
list.description:
Unpack the byte slice (presumably packed by Pack(format, msg)) according to the given format.
The result is a []interface{} slice even if it contains exactly one item.
The byte slice must contain not less the amount of data required by the format
(len(msg) must more or equal CalcSize(format)).

list.title: module:telnet~IsTelnetResponse
list.description: IsTelnetResponse is an object containing the response of the IsTelnet check.

list.title: module:telnet~TelnetClient#IsTelnet
list.description: IsTelnet checks if a host is running a Telnet server

list.title: module:vnc~IsVNCResponse
list.description: IsVNCResponse is an object containing the response of the IsVNC method.

list.title: module:vnc~VNCClient#IsVNC
list.description: IsVNC checks if a host is running a VNC server.
